snippet.title: A Matter of Murder Game Trailer
snippet.description:
A Matter of Murder is a puzzle-mystery game with rogue-like elements for Windows, Mac, iOS and Android. 

Download Now: 
On Android - Google Play Store: http://goo.gl/BBNPGT 
On iOS - The App Store: https://t.co/RXD0REBm21
On PC/MAC - 
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/510040/
Itch.io: https://worthingandmoncrieff.itch.io/a-matter-of-murder
IndieGameStand: https://indiegamestand.com/store/2494/a-matter-of-murder/

www.worthingandmoncrieff.com

FOLLOW / CONTACT US:

http://www.amatterofmurder.com
https://twitter.com/amatterofmurder/
https://www.facebook.com/MatterOfM
